comment: Configuration data for the Alexa Space/X Info skill

settings.Welcome_speech: Welcome, I can tell you about space ex. say Help for more information about what you can ask me to do. Note that I am not affiliated with space ex in any way.
settings.Welcome_card_text:
Information about Space/X's activities.
Note that this Alexa skill is not affiliated with Space/X in ANY way.

settings.Welcome_speech: Hi there, I can tell you all about space ex. say Help for more information about what you can ask me to do. By the way, remember that I am not connected to space ex in any way.
